Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/
Sixshot/Ares:



Sixshot transformed into his space fighter mode, Ares getting in.  He took 
off, heading for the mainland.

Injector and Bumblebee lifted off in their biped modes, flying after Sixshot.

Double Punch and Manterror got into a shuttle, followed by Demon Wulf, Dark 
Claw, and Flesh Ripper.

The shuttle took off after the four other Alliance members.
